Package PoolGame.Builder

Interface BallBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlackBallBuilder, BlueBallBuilder, BrownBallBuilder, GreenBallBuilder, OrangeBallBuilder, PurpleBallBuilder, RedBallBuilder, WhiteBallBuilder, YellowBallBuilder
    public interface BallBuilder
    The builder interface that specify the methods needed to build a ball

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Ball finaliseBuild()
      Get the ball that has been configured and start a new build.
      void reset()
      Reset the builder
      void setBallType​(Ball.BallType type)
      Set the ball type of the new ball.
      void setMass​(double mass)
      Set the mass of the new ball.
      void setPocketAction​(BallPocketStrategy action)
      Set the action to be carried out when the new ball falls into a pocket.
      void setXPos​(double xPos)
      Set the x position of the ball.
      void setXVel​(double xVel)
      Set the x velocity of the ball.
      void setYPos​(double yPos)
      Set the y position of the ball.
      void setYVel​(double yVel)
      Set the y velocity of the ball.

      • setPocketAction

        void setPocketAction​(BallPocketStrategy action)
        Set the action to be carried out when the new ball falls into a pocket.
        Parameters:
        action - The action for the new ball to carry out.

      • finaliseBuild

        Ball finaliseBuild()
        Get the ball that has been configured and start a new build.
        Returns:
        The instance of the ball that has been configured by using the setters
